name: livedoc-mocha
author: Garry McGlennon
description: BDD extensions for Mocha that support LiveDoc reporting.

scripts.test-reporter-nocolor: mocha  --require build/app/index --require build/app/livedoc-spec --reporter build/app/livedoc-spec --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-dev: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require build/app/livedoc-spec --reporter build/app/livedoc-spec --ui livedoc-mocha --ld-include dev --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-summary: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require build/app/livedoc-spec --reporter build/app/livedoc-spec -O detailLevel=summary --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-list: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require build/app/livedoc-spec --reporter build/app/livedoc-spec -O detailLevel=list --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-summary-file: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require build/app/livedoc-spec --reporter build/app/livedoc-spec -O "detailLevel=summary,output=results.txt" --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-summary-json: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require build/app/livedoc-spec --reporter build/app/livedoc-spec --ld-reporters ./livedoc-json -O "detailLevel=summary,json-output=results.json" --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.test-reporter-emoji: mocha --colors --require build/app/index --require build/app/reporter/LiveDocEmoji --reporter build/app/reporter/LiveDocEmoji --ui livedoc-mocha --recursive build/test/**/*.Spec.js
scripts.release-web: npm run compile-web && npm run compile-web-minify
scripts.release: rimraf release && tsc -d -p tsconfig.npm.json && npm run release-fix
scripts.release-fix: cpx package.json release && npm run release-copy-globals && npm run release-copy-index
scripts.pack: cd release && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../ && rimraf *.tgz
